name: leaf-storm
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.platinum: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
